entity.name: The White House
entity.description: Conversation from and about the White House, both as a destination and as political voice

text: @WhiteHouse Mr. No Mask comes to your factory making COVID-19 test kit swabs. The workers are trying to keep the work place sterile but Trump's ego takes precedence. Right?
